task: Develop a basic 'Paperboy' game. Modify it by applying the oblique strategy: 'Twist the spine'.
name: Paper Twist

branding_data.short_description: Deliver newspapers with a twist in this innovative cycling challenge.
branding_data.detailed_description: Paper Twist is an exciting reimagining of the classic 'Paperboy' game where players take on the role of a daring paper delivery cyclist. In this version, the simple act of tossing newspapers becomes a dynamic challenge as the game world is literally twisted. Streets curve and bend unexpectedly, requiring players to adapt quickly to changing paths and obstacles. The objective remains to deliver newspapers to subscribers while avoiding obstacles and collecting bonuses. However, the 'twist' adds a new layer of strategy and skill, making each delivery route a unique and thrilling experience.
